overview.summary: Visualize vector field with arrows at the data points.

description.p: Visualize vector field with arrows at the data points.
This module displays vectors at the data points of a field as arrows. There is no interpolation or sampling, so the resolution is completely dependent on the data resolution.

If the "2D" button is selected, a two-dimensional slice of the vector field will be represented. The "Find" buttons in the upper left will allow the user to select a centered axis aligned plane. If "3D" is selected all of the vectors in the domain will be displayed.
Various controls exist to edit the look of the vectors. The vectors can also be colored according to a scalar field, by attaching a scalar field to the second port and a Colormap to the third port.
